docs.title: Welcome
docs.text:
Welcome to How2Red

TRY. FAIL. LEARN. TRY AGAIN. GET BETTER.

Windows TTPs Linux TTPs Just a Test

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Linux TTPs
docs.text:
Linux post-exploitation techniques, persistence methods, and useful enumeration commands.

🧪 Work in progress: SSH abuse, SUID/SGID tricks, reverse shells.

docs.title: Test Section
docs.text:
This page is for experiments, drafts, or sandbox content.

📦 Feel free to break things here.

docs.title: Windows TTPs
docs.text:
Explore Windows-specific red team tactics, techniques, and procedures.
